page.title: 07THE DAY BEGINS IN LYNWORTH
page.content: THIS IS A{NORMAL MONDAY MORNING.}MUM COMES INTO MY ROOM, WAKES ME UP AND LEAVES TO GO DOWN STAIRS. I LIE ON MY BACK WISHING I COULD GO BACK TO SLEEP FOR THE WHOLE DAY. FIVE MINUTES LATER DAD COMES TO GET ME OUT OF BED. I PULL TOGETHER MY STRENGTH AND SCRAMBLE OUT OF BED. I TOTTER INTO THE BATHROOM AND HAVE A GOOD WASH IN ICE COLD WATER TO WAKE ME UP. THE WATER GIVES ME NUMB HANDS BUT AFTER A COUPLE OF RUBS THEY START TO COME TO LIFE. I WALK BACK TO MY BEDROOM DRESSING AS I GO. WHEN I AM DRESSED I GO DOWN STAIRS AND INTO THE DINING ROOM. I STAND ON THE EDGE OF THE SETTEE WITH BRUSH AND COMB AND LOOK IN THE MIRROR TO BRUSH MY HAIR. MUM ASKS WHETHER I WANT TOAST OR CEREAL AND I ALWAYS SAY TOAST.AT 8.25a.m.DAD LEAVES FOR WORK BY CAR.I LEAVE FOR SCHOOL AT 8.40a.m. IT IS A 10 TO 15 MINUTE WALK.
